title: Cali Philharmonic Orchestra
text:
The Cali Philharmonic Orchestra (Spanish: Orquesta Filarmónica de Cali (OFC)) is a Colombian orchestra based in based in Cali, Valle del Cauca, Colombia. It is the only professional orchestra in the southwest of Colombia and the smallest in the country, considered one of the oldest symphonic groups with a long history of more than 80 years and one of the most prestigious symphonic groups together with the National Symphony Orchestra of Colombia and the Philharmonic Orchestra of Medellín.
Since February 2012, the Orchestra is being directed by Irwin Hoffman.
